subsection.name: Locale loader valve
subsection.p: The pipeline processing valve responsible for loading the user prefered locale and encoding.

subsection.name: Request parameters loader valve
subsection.p: The pipeline processing valve that read the parameters from request parameters and from parsed url path and store it as a parameters container in thread context.

subsection.name: Exception redirector valve
subsection.p: The pipeline processing valve which redirect to appropriate view if the exception occured during pipeline processing.

subsection.name: Upload
subsection.p: The Upload component is the implementation of the pipeline processing valve, that is run at very early stage of the pipeline processing. When it discovers the "multipart/form-data" it starts to process the request storing the uploaded items into the context.

subsection.name: MVC initializer valve
subsection.p: The pipeline valve that initialize all needed data for mvc pipeline processing

subsection.name: MVC results valve
subsection.p: The pipeline valve that read the processing result and write it to servlet response

subsection.name: Action executor valve
subsection.p: The pipeline valve that execute the action if appears in request.

subsection.name: Builder executor valve
subsection.p: Pipeline component for executing MVC view building.
